title: How to Use an Ultrasonic Cleaner to Clean Your Jewelry

steps.title: Fill the tank of your cleaner with water, adding a tablespoon of ammonia.
steps.content: Fill the tank of your cleaner with water, adding a tablespoon of ammonia. Don't use too much because it can be harmful. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Add some dishwashing liquid, and you are done.
steps.content: Add some dishwashing liquid, and you are done.

steps.title: Turn on the cleaner and let it run without any items for 5-10 minutes so that the solution gets mixed well.
steps.content: Turn on the cleaner and let it run without any items for 5-10 minutes so that the solution gets mixed well. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Put your item(s) into the tank.
steps.content: Put your item(s) into the tank. Remember not to put in too many pieces at once or it may scratch your jewelry.

steps.title: Heat the solution and set temperatures you need.
steps.content: Heat the solution and set temperatures you need. To work best, it needs to heat the solution. There are many ultrasonic cleaners that have a built-in heater to ensure that the solution is heated up. They differ in price. Just heat the water up before you put it in the tank. Do not bring the water to a boil. Mix in the ammonia and the dishwashing liquid Set the temperatures you need.

steps.title: Turn the device on.
steps.content: Turn the device on. Let it run for as long as needed until your jewelry is clean. Depending on how dirty the items are, this time usually varies from 1 to 20 minutes

steps.title: When the cleaning is done, switch the cleaner off.
steps.content: When the cleaning is done, switch the cleaner off. Leave your jewelry inside for another 5-10 minutes so that the dirt particles can fall to the bottom of the tank.

steps.title: Take your jewelry out and clean it briefly with a soft brush.
steps.content: Take your jewelry out and clean it briefly with a soft brush. Make sure that any residual dirt is removed, especially from the mountings of your rings.

steps.title: Rinse the items.
steps.content: Rinse the items. Wash off any remaining detergent, and dry them with a soft cloth.
